attributes.action: Force local goverment to offer the electrate to vote on the way we are governed
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The government introduced a bill over 7 years ago allowing local authorities to take this kind of plunge in to enhancing their democracy and accountability, but there was not enough support from councillors at the time to encourage the electorate of Basildon area to desire the constitutional change. I think that turn outs are dwinderling and something new most grab hold of the public imagination Excutive Mayors would do this so lets force local autorities to talk about change and give the people the options of change NOW!!! GIVE people the choice, open debate then elections on local excutive goverment change.
